attributes.action: Emergency day for the services to be honoured every year for their efforts.
attributes.additional_details: Because the NHS have worked tirelessly and deserve the appreciation for all their efforts. During the COVID 19 period which is brutal for much of Europe and the rest of the world.
attributes.background: This day will be dedicated for the emergency services and could be a day off or bank holiday or something like a appreciation day just for the emergency services and to celebrate the efforts during the COVID 19 period on keeping the nation healthy and safe. For the UK and overseas territories.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
